info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 4:27PM EDT until July 27 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Litchfield County in northern Connecticut... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 427 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cornwall Bridge, or 9 miles southwest of Torrington, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Torrington, Thomaston, New Hartford, Litchfield, Northwest Harwinton, New Preston, Terryville, Cornwall Bridge, New Hartford Center, Plymouth, Harwinton, Bethlehem, Goshen, Morris, Warren, Cornwall, Bantam, West Torrington, Torringford and Haight Vineyard. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
